mapper.select: SELECT accountType, id, level1, level2, level3, description FROM ( SELECT 'ASSET' as accountType, id, level1, level2, level3, description FROM assets UNION ALL SELECT 'LIABILITY' as accountType, id, level1, level2, level3, description FROM liabilities UNION ALL SELECT 'EQUITY' as accountType, id, level1, level2, level3, description FROM equity UNION ALL SELECT 'INCOME' as accountType, id, level1, level2, level3, description FROM income UNION ALL SELECT 'EXPENSE' as accountType, id, level1, level2, level3, description FROM expenses ) all_accounts ORDER BY accountType, level1, level2, level3
